name: poisonium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Poison moves.
short_effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Poison moves.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Poison-type moves to Z-Moves.
